component.name: SDL
component.summary: SDL is a library that allows programs portable low level access to a video framebuffer, audio output, mouse, and keyboard.

description.p: The Simple DirectMedia Layer (SDL) is a library that allows programs portable low level access to a video framebuffer, audio output, mouse, and keyboard.
This version of SDL is compiled with X11, caca and DirectFB graphics drivers and OSS, ALSA, NAS and PulseAudio sound drivers.
